```python
def calculate_flesch_kincaid(text):
    # Split text into words and sentences
    words = text.split()
    sentences = text.split('. ')

    # Calculate total words and total syllables
    total_words = len(words)
    total_syllables = sum(len(word) for word in words)

    # Calculate Flesch-Kincaid Grade Level
    grade_level = 0.39 * (total_words / len(sentences)) + 11.8 * (total_syllables / total_words) - 15.59

    return round(grade_level)

# Plan
